item.title: Instagram Reels - Art Direction Provided - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a video editor in Premiere Pro who will execute 5-6 reels every 3 months.

We will provide clips, audio, typeface and graphics. They are for a boutique custom vehicle brand, so the focus is all about the cars. There will be no intense editing, just a few clips, some closing text and a brand frame.

Please let me know if you can have these completed in the next two weeks.  Here's a link to the truck. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oExYfnTDKLs

Hourly Range: $36.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 00:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Video, Adobe Premiere Pro, Instagram
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Channel Videos Intro - Upwork
item.description:
I want to have created a 5 to 10 seconds intro to be used at the beginning of all videos for my YouTube channel, one additional mid way 5 second bit, and another 5 seconds bit for the ending of each video. Price will be based on prior experience and expertise.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 23:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
